mapper.select: SELECT r.MTCLTN_YD_CD, r.YEAR_CD, r.DEPT_CD, r.RCRT_CD, ss.BGNG_YMD, ss.END_YMD, es.EVL_STG_NM, es.EVL_STG_NO, es.RCRT_NO, es.PRGR FROM RCRT r INNER JOIN RCRT_SCHDL ss ON r.RCRT_NO = ss.RCRT_NO INNER JOIN EVALUATE_STAGE es ON r.RCRT_NO = es.RCRT_NO AND ss.EVL_STG_CD = es.EVL_STG_CD WHERE r.MTCLTN_YD_CD=#{mtcltn_yd_cd} AND r.DEPT_CD=#{dept_cd} AND r.RCRT_CD=#{rcrt_cd};
SELECT * FROM STAGE_EVALUATOR WHERE EVL_STG_NO=#{evl_stg_no} AND RCRT_NO=#{rcrt_no};
